function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Noise pollution in buildings from various sources impacting occupant well-being and health","Impact":"Occupant dissatisfaction, decreased recovery period in hospitals, cognitive stress, hypertension","Mitigation":"Improved building insulation, noise control measures, sound-absorbing materials","Technologies":"Sound masking systems, noise-cancelling materials, acoustic panels","People":"Building occupants, hospital staff, patients, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility management"},{"Description":"Disease outbreaks due to poor water quality and distribution in buildings","Impact":"Hospitalization, disease outbreaks, microbial contaminations, chemical contaminations","Mitigation":"Regular water testing, maintenance of water systems, cross-connection control, microbial growth prevention","Technologies":"Water filtration systems, water quality monitoring sensors, regular sanitation procedures","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, building managers","Owner":"Building owners, facility management"},{"Description":"Lack of physical activity opportunities in buildings leading to occupant health issues","Impact":"Premature death, chronic diseases, decreased physical well-being, depression","Mitigation":"Providing active workstations, promoting physical activity opportunities, supporting active commuters","Technologies":"Active workstations, bike storage facilities, changing and shower facilities","People":"Building occupants, employers, facility management","Owner":"Building owners, employers"}]}
